title: r/Prorevenge Karen Scammed My Family For $100,000, So I Sent Her To Prison!
description: r/Prorevenge This epic tale of revenge puts a farm girl against a city-slicker scammer. The scammer fools OP's family once and steals over $100,000 from her family. Years pass, and OP stumbles upon a chance for truly epic revenge when she catches the scammer red-handed in one of her illegal schemes. This time, there's going to be a lot of angry people and cops involved!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
